25 Pemerintah Daerah Telah Laporkan Hitungan Kenaikan UMP
04 Nov 2019, 13:03 by Francisca Christy Rosana, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Sebanyak 25 pemerintah daerah telah mengumumkan kenaikan upah minimum provinsi atau UMP 2020 hingga 4 November 2019. Jumlah ini meningkat ketimbang laporan yang disampaikan kepada Kementerian Ketenagakerjaan pada Jumat, 1 November 2019 lalu yang baru mencapai 20 daerah.
“Secara informasi kami mendengar 25 provinsi. Tapi detailnya saya belum mengantongi. Kami tunggu laporan tertulisnya,” ujar Direktur Jenderal Pembinaan Hubungan Industrial dan Jaminan Sosial Tenaga Kerja Kementerian Ketenagakerjaan Haiyani Rumondang seusai rapat dengar pendapat dengan Komisi IX Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat atau DPR di kompleks DPR RI Senayan, Jakarta, Senin, 4 November 2019.
Hingga hari ini, Haiyani mengungkapkan bahwa laporan tersebut baru diterima secara lisan oleh pemerintah. Dengan tambahan tersebut, berarti saat ini masih ada sembilan provinsi yang belum menyerahkan laporan kenaikan UMP-nya.
Kenaikan upah per provinsi mengacu pada data inflasi dan pertumbuhan ekonomi nasional yang dikeluarkan oleh Badan Pusat Statistik. Menurut data itu, upah minimum provinsi 2020 masing-masing naik sebesar 8,51.
Perhitungan kenaikan UMP secara formal tertuang dalam Peraturan Pemerintah (PP) Nomor 78 Tahun 2015 tentang Pengupahan. Adapun penetapan UMP 2020 yang diumumkan serentak oleh gubernur tiap-tiap provinsi dilegalkan dalam keputusan gubernur sesuai dengan Pasal 9 Peraturan Menteri Ketenagakerjaan Nomor 15 Tahun 2018 tentang Upah Minimum.

25 Local Governments Report Report on UMP Increase
Nov 04 2019, 13:03 by Francisca Christy Rosana, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - As many as 25 local governments have announced increases in the provincial minimum wage or UMP 2020 until November 4, 2019. This number has increased compared to reports submitted to the Ministry of Manpower on Friday, November 1, 2019, which then only reached 20 regions.
"Information we heard about 25 provinces. But the details I have not pocketed. We are waiting for the written report, "said the Director General of Industrial Relations Development and Labor Social Security of the Ministry of Manpower Haiyani Rumondang after the hearing with the Commission IX of the House of Representatives or the House of Representatives in the DPR RI Senayan complex, Jakarta, Monday, November 4, 2019.
To this day, Haiyani revealed that the report had only been received verbally by the government. With these additions, it means that currently there are still nine provinces that have not submitted their UMP increase reports.
Wage increases per province refer to inflation data and national economic growth released by the Central Statistics Agency. According to the data, the 2020 provincial minimum wage each rose by 8.51.
Calculation of UMP increase is formally stated in Government Regulation (PP) No. 78 of 2015 concerning Wages. The stipulation of the 2020 UMP that was announced simultaneously by the governors of each province was legalized in the governor's decision in accordance with Article 9 of the Minister of Manpower Regulation No. 15 of 2018 concerning Minimum Wages.
